SELECT rs.resv_id , rs.resource_id , rs.resv_emp , TO_CHAR(rs.resv_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as resv_date , rs.resv_stime , rs.resv_etime , rs.resv_title , rc.resc_name , rc.resc_type_id FROM reservation rs JOIN resources rc ON rs.resource_id = rc.resc_id WHERE resv_emp = ${id}
